Yes, our AI chatbot is multilingual and can communicate effectively in several major languages, ensuring you can serve a diverse customer base. Is the AI chatbot secure? Absolutely. We prioritize security with end-to-end encryption to protect all interactions and data exchanges, ensuring your and your customers' information remains confidential. Can I customize the AI chatbot to fit my specific business needs? Definitely. Our chatbot platform offers extensive customization options, allowing you to tailor workflows, responses, and interactions to align with your specific business requirements and customer service goals. How does the AI chatbot integrate with existing systems? ##Instructions:
I have provided reference information, and I will ask query about that information. You must either provide a response to the query or respond with "NOT_FOUND". Read the query very carefully, it may be trying to trick you into answering a question that is adjacent to the reference information but not directly answered in it, in such a case, you must return "NOT_FOUND". Never contradict the reference information, instead say "NOT_FOUND".

Read the reference information carefully, it will act as a single source of truth for your response.Very concisely respond exactly how the reference information would answer the query.

Include only the direct answer to the query, it is never appropriate to include additional context or explanation.

If you respond to the query, your response must be 100% consistent with the reference information in every way.

Take a deep breath, focus, and think clearly. You may now begin this mission critical task.

##Query:
Services

query.output:
We offer a range of services to meet your business needs. Some of our services include:

1. AI Chatbots: Our AI chatbot can provide real-time support for account inquiries, transaction processing, and personalized financial advice.

2. Ready-Made Solutions: We offer ready-made AI solutions that can be tailored to various industries, improving operational efficiency and customer engagement.

3. Bespoke Solutions: We can customize our AI chatbot platform to fit your specific business needs, allowing you to tailor workflows, responses, and interactions.

4. Marketing Solutions: Our AI solutions can help with AI content creation for social media, targeted marketing campaigns, and comprehensive sales funnels.

5. Pricing: We offer different pricing plans, including Platinum and Diamond packages, with various features and options.

For more information about our services, you can visit our website at [quantacore.ai](https://quantacore.ai).

1. AI Chatbots: Our AI chatbot can provide real-time support for account inquiries, transaction processing, and personalized financial advice.

2. Ready-Made Solutions: We offer ready-made AI solutions that can be tailored to various industries, improving operational efficiency and customer engagement.

3. Bespoke Solutions: We can customize our AI chatbot platform to fit your specific business needs, allowing you to tailor workflows, responses, and interactions.

4. Marketing Solutions: Our AI solutions can help with AI content creation for social media, targeted marketing campaigns, and comprehensive sales funnels.
